message.content:
Looking at the financial statement to identify the costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers.

In financial statements, these costs are typically captured under "Selling Expenses" which include costs related to marketing, sales, distribution, and customer service - all activities designed to secure orders and deliver products to customers.

From the income statement provided, I can see:
- "Selling Expenses" line item with a value of 855800.20

This represents the costs incurred specifically for securing customer orders and delivering goods and services to customers.

{"solution": {'value': '855800.20'}}
